etomica.modules.joulethomson

Class JouleThomson

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graphics.SimulationGraphic
      • etomica.modules.joulethomson.JouleThomson
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulationContainer

    public class JouleThomson
extends SimulationGraphic
    Joule Thomson Experiment Ed Maginn [University of Notre Dame], David Kofke [University at Buffalo] Permits study of a system undergoing isothermal or isenthalpic expansion and compression. Isenthalpic expansion is known as Joule-Thomson process, and is the basis of many common refrigeration processes.
